article_title: Judge Jeanine demolishes indictment of Perry
article_text:
Judge Jeanine Pirro spent the first five minutes of her show utterly demolishing the politicized indictment of Texas Governor Rick Perry. She is a national treasure. The dicussion with Democrat Joe Trippi that follows shows that even Democrats are appalled. Trippi suspects it will help Perry in his quest for the nomination. I suspect the Democrat game is to help Perry get the nomination and then use this case as a distraction and doubt-creater in the general election. Accusing Mitt Romney of murdering a worker with cancer worked well, after all. The ridiculousness of the charge doesn't matter.

Watch and enjoy:

Judge Jeanine Pirro spent the first five minutes of her show utterly demolishing the politicized indictment of Texas Governor Rick Perry.
Trippi suspects it will help Perry in his quest for the nomination.
I suspect the Democrat game is to help Perry get the nomination and then use this case as a distraction and doubt-creater in the general election.
The dicussion with Democrat Joe Trippi that follows shows that even Democrats are appalled.
Accusing Mitt Romney of murdering a worker with cancer worked well, after all.
